Auto Generated Documentation¶

Middleware splunk command line tool to run splunk queries using the underlying splunk API’s for python. Import the custom connect_splunk and splunk_search modules from current project.

mw_splunk_tool.main()[source]¶

Command line tool accepts the following arguments.

Positional args:
  • execmode (str): Only the values from the given choices list are accepted.
  • startdate (str): Start date.
  • enddate (str): End date.
Optional args:
  • household (str): Valid household uuid.
  • api (str): Valid api name.
  • splunkindex (str): Valid splunk index.
  • mwenv (str): Valid mw env.
  • couchurl (str): Valid couch url.

Custom splunk_search module implements SplunkSearch and SplunkSearchJob classes.

class splunk_search.SplunkSearch(service, start_date, end_date)[source]¶

SplunkSearch class initializes the following attributes.

  • service
  • start_date
  • end_date.

Implements search() method which accepts the search_query parameter.

search(search_query)[source]¶

Trigger search job() based on the search_query argument passed.

class splunk_search.SplunkSearchJob(service, start_date, end_date, story_mode, household_id, select_api)[source]¶

SplunkSearchJob class inherits from SplunkSearch.

Class attributes:
  • splunk_index.
  • mw_env.
  • couch_url.
Initializes attributes:
  • story_mode.
  • household_id.
  • select_api.
print_output(processed_results)[source]¶

This method accepts the parameter processed_results and prints results onto the console.

Raises:ValueError.
process_results(search_results)[source]¶

This method accepts the parameter search_results and returns the processed results.

Raises:AttributeError.
search_job(splunk_index, mw_env, couch_url)[source]¶

This method accepts the parameters splunk_index,mw_env and couch_url. Calls the search method of parent class based on the conditional statement.

Raises:slib.HTTPError.

Custom connect_splunk module implements ConnectToSplunk class and static method connect.

class connect_splunk.ConnectToSplunk[source]¶

ConnectToSplunk declares the following constants.

  • HOST.
  • PORT.
  • USERNAME.
  • PASSWORD.

Implements static method connect() which creates and returns a service instance.
